Detailed Description

Author:
Brecht Verstichel
Date:
23-02-2010

This class, EIG_PQ is a "block"-vector over the carrierspace's of the P and Q conditions. It contains room to store the eigenvalues of a P and a Q block, and special member function that work with these eigenvalues. This class should only be used when a SUP_PQ matrix has been diagonalized, some functions could give strange results when the EIG object is filled with random numbers.

This function is the mother class of all EIG_PQ* classes.

Friends And Related Function Documentation

ostream& operator<< ( ostream &  output,
EIG_PQ &  eig_p 
) [friend]

Output stream operator overloaded, the usage is simple, if you want to print to a file, make an ifstream object and type:

object << eig_p << endl;

For output onto the screen type:

cout << eig_p << endl;

Parameters:
output The stream to which you are writing (e.g. cout)
eig_p the EIG you want to print

Reimplemented in EIG_PQG, and EIG_PQGT1.
